author: rse
msg: Add note about "env" usage or the C-shell variant "setenv KEY VALUE".
Thanks to Dean and Lars for mentioning this.

author: brian
msg: Populated tree with .indent.pro files.  They may need to be customized per
directory; and code should probably be validated against it at some point.

author: dgaudet
msg: This should help folks trying to understand vhosts.  It adds the command
line option -S which dumps a description of how apache parsed the vhost
directives.  In particular it'd really help the folks who recently ran
